description: Josh Peters is late for dinner with the wifey and that’s not a good thing considering his relationship is already on the rocks. Will Braun offers to cut the training short, and let Josh use his place to get ready for his date. When Will sees the big man naked in the shower, he assumes Josh left the door open for a reason. Josh eventually realizes his wife’s being a bitch for holding out on him and he should take a hold of Will’s hot ass while he’s got the chance.
title: Trainer Confessions Part 2
